Link

A pure CSS component

Anatomy

There are 5 different link anatomies, each requiring specific accessibility attributes.

Internal Link Internal Link External Link Download Link 
<a class="link" href="#">Internal Link</a>
                  <a class="link" href="#">Internal Link
                  <svg class="link__icon" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">
                  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13.5 4.5 21 12m0 0-7.5 7.5M21 12H3"></path>
                  </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a class="link" href="#" aria-label="Internal link icon only">
                  <svg class="link__icon" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">
                  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13.5 4.5 21 12m0 0-7.5 7.5M21 12H3"></path>
                  </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a class="link" href="#" target="_blank">External Link
                  <svg class="link__icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">
                  <title>Opens in a new window</title>
                  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M13.5 6H5.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 3 8.25v10.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 5.25 21h10.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 18 18.75V10.5m-10.5 6L21 3m0 0h-5.25M21 3v5.25"></path>
                  </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a class="link" href="#">Download Link
                  <svg class="link__icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">
                  <title>Download PDF, 2MB</title>
                  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M3 16.5v2.25A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 5.25 21h13.5A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 21 18.75V16.5M16.5 12 12 16.5m0 0L7.5 12m4.5 4.5V3"></path>
                  </svg>
                  </a>

Text

Text link does not require additonal attibutes

Text and SVG

svg tag requires aria-hidden="true" to hide it from screen readers as the the text already include the necessary information

SVG

a tag requires aria-label="Go to destination" to indicate the destination to user information

External

a tag requires target="_blank" to open the link in a new window

svg tag requires titletag to decribe the opening in a new window

Download link

svg tag requires titletag to describe the size and format of the downloaded file

Modifier

Each link can be styled with modifiers.

You can mix as many modifiers modifiers on the same link, however you can choose only one choice per modifer

For convenience the default variant name is omited, meaning there is no need to add the default name class

Modifier Option Description
Font Color base(default), brand, alert Use any semantic colors.
Size inherit(default), sm, md, lg, xl Modify the size of the link.

Font Color

Set the font color of each link

Options: inherit(default), base, brand, alert

Inherit Link Base Link Brand Link Alert Link Brand Link Alert Link Link Inherit Link Base Link Brand Link Alert Download Link Download Link Download Link Download Link

Size

Set the size of each button

Options: inherit(default), sm, md, lg, xl

RTL

RTL support for link with icon

Mix

Mix as many modifiers for each link

Internal Link Internal Link Internal Link External Link External Link External Link Download Link Download Link Download Link Internal Link Internal Link Internal Link External Link External Link External Link Download Link Download Link Download Link Internal Link Internal Link Internal Link External Link External Link External Link Download Link Download Link Download Link

Custom (Tailwind)

If you are using Tailwind styling, you can customize each button with Tailwind utilities

External Link Download Link Internal Link 
<a class="link link--lg text-yellow-600 after:bg-red-800 after:h-1 after:-bottom-1 [&amp;_svg]:text-purple-700" href="#" target="_blank">External Link
                  <svg class="link__icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">

                  </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a class="link link--font-brand hover:text-slate-700 after:hidden hover:underline hover:underline-offset-8 transition [&amp;_svg]:border-alert-2  [&amp;_svg]:border-2  [&amp;_svg]:rounded-full  [&amp;_svg]:p-1  [&amp;_svg]:size-10" href="#">Download Link
                  <svg class="link__icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor">

                  </svg>
                  </a>

Templates

Link components is available in the followng templates

  • Corex template

    Default corex templates. It provides the global, semantic and components tokens

    CSS Tailwind Design Tokens

  • Modex template

    Based on Corex default template, it adds dark and light mode option to the tokens

    CSS Tailwind Design Tokens

  • Themex template

    Based on the Corex default template, it adds theming capabilities as well as light and dark mode options to the tokens.

    CSS Tailwind Design Tokens
Dialog Listbox
